body:
oh i see, so this is an MKL + OSX issue.

Okay in this case, you'd need to create a small test program in-line in FindBLAS.cmake:
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/TH/cmake/FindBLAS.cmake#L242-L277

and then set an appropriate `-D` in CMakeLists.txt similar to this: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/TH/CMakeLists.txt#L307-L309

and then set an appropriate -D in CMakeLists.txt similar to this: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/TH/CMakeLists.txt#L307-L309
body_text:
oh i see, so this is an MKL + OSX issue.
Okay in this case, you'd need to create a small test program in-line in FindBLAS.cmake:
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/TH/cmake/FindBLAS.cmake#L242-L277
and then set an appropriate -D in CMakeLists.txt similar to this: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/TH/CMakeLists.txt#L307-L309
